text: Kare (yūsufu) wa itta. `Omo yo, watashi wa kano on'na-tachi ga yūwaku suru mono yori mo, rōgoku ga muite imasu. Anata ga moshika no on'na-tachi no waru takurami o, watashi kara torinozoite kudasaranakereba, watashi wa (jakunen no yowa-sa de) ka no on'na-tachi ni katamuite, mudōna mono ni narudeshou
